Module com.example.assessment
Package com.example.assessment

Class SqliteUserDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.assessment.SqliteUserDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserDAOInterface
public class SqliteUserDAO extends Object implements UserDAOInterface
Implementation of the UserDAOInterface for SQLite database. Manages user-related database operations such as adding users, verifying passwords, and retrieving user accounts.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor
    Description
    SqliteUserDAO()
    Constructs a SqliteUserDAO object and initializes the database connection.
